department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined bikini top with a metal fastener at the back and back of the neck.
Short top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Vest top in ribbed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps and a racer back. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Shopper with two handles and a tie fastening with metal pendants. Unlined. Size 12x32x33 cm.
Waist belt in shimmering metallic imitation leather with elastication and a metal buckle at the back and three straps with decorative metal buckles covered in rhinestones at the front. Width 7.5 cm.
Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Scuba trainers with imitation leather details, a strap with a hook and loop fastening and decorative flowers at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a heavily draping rib knit containing glittery threads with long raglan sleeves.
Short coat in a sturdy wool blend with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud at the front, concealed side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in airy, spotted cotton poplin with a turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with wide shoulder straps and a knot detail at the top.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs with a concealed zip at the hems.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 2.2 cm.

Sleeveless, draped body in mesh with a deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, and cut-out section at the back. Shoulder straps with a decorative knot detail at the front, a seam and a jersey lower section. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs. Jersey lining at the top.
Short, sleeveless, A-line dress in woven fabric. Narrow cut at the top with gathers front and back and a decorative bow on one shoulder. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Hat in a soft jacquard knit with a pompom on top and a detachable, faux fur false beard at the bottom.
Romper suit in soft pile with a zip down the front, a hood with embroidery and ears, front pockets in the shape of paws, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Unlined.
Pull-on trousers in washed, stretch twill with an elasticated, drawstring waist, front pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with long puff sleeves.
Wide shirt in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck and pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and adjustable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Puffer jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, covered elastication at the cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 10.5 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Shirt in checked twill with a soft brushed finish. Lined jersey hood, chest pocket with a press-stud, press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a V-neck and crossover, decorative straps at the back. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Opaque tights with an elasticated waist and soft fleece inside.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, flap leg pockets and ribbed hems.

Long parka in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.
Short, A-line dress in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Oversized, straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in a brushed wool blend with peak lapels and front pockets. Dropped shoulders, straight, long sleeves with fringes at the back, and a fringed hem. Lined.
Jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short lace dress with long lace sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Sweatpants with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed style with a slightly lower crotch, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Scarf in patterned silk. Size 80x80 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Joggers in a stretch weave with a print at the top. Elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered motif on the front and an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Shorts in soft, cool satin with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey with long sleeves, gathers at the front and sides, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short shorts in light sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Slightly wider neckline with a V-shaped opening at the back and ties at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves, and smocking at the waist and cuffs.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft and ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort.
Short, pleated skirt in an airy weave. Jersey inner skirt.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and elbow patches in a contrasting colour.
Cropped, soft jersey top in a narrow cut at the top with a racer back and narrow shoulder straps.
Soft slippers in velour with appliqués in the shape of a unicorn head at the front, wings at the sides and a faux fur tail. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Loose-fitting top in soft jersey with a motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and braces with an adjustable fastening at the front.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and picot trims.
Knee-length skirt with decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip at the back.

Blouse in airy plumeti chiffon with embroidery at the front, a small, frilled collar with ties at the front, and covered buttons down the front. Wide raglan sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Top in a patterned, textured weave with a round neck, opening with a button at the back of the neck and a yoke with a flounced trim at the front that continues over the shoulders.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
